:::English:::
=============
Category: Photography and Design
Platform: Mac
System Requirements: Mac OS X 10.4.8
Snow Leopard compatible
Minimum screen resolution 1024 x 768
QuickTime 7 required for export QTVR
Language: Multilingual [Includes Spanish]

Live Interior 3D Pro Edition:
-----------------------------
The registered version of Live Interior 3D brings the experience of home design to an advanced level, offering an array of advanced tools that empowers you to take maximum control over your 3D design project home without complicated twists and turns.

2D Floor Plans:
-----------------
A map of your home or office in a 2D CAD-like plant. sketch soft walls, ceilings and other items of plant using the versatile drawing tools.

Place marks dimension, custom annotations and more to the right in the area of its plant in 2D.

Real-time editing in 3D:
-----------------------------
Take a virtual tour of your living space to get an inside view from any point of view and make adjustments in 3D mode. Changes are made in real time!

You can edit any aspect of your future home in 3D realistic environment. Adding furniture and change the wallpaper is as simple as dragging and dropping fast.

Live Interior 3D, lighting management of your project. You have full control over the color and brightness of any source of light. Set the day to see how the light of external influences inner shadows.

Select solid or smooth shade mode of representation to obtain a clear picture of your home.

Diversity content and import capabilities:
-------------------------------------------------- -------
3D objects 1200 + and 1500 + materials provided with Live Interior 3D provides everything needed to experiment with your interior.
